select * from book
where title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
and author like CONCAT('%', #{author}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into studyboard (id, booktitle, bookcover, title, content, startdate, enddate, challengestart, challengeend, challengeperiod, quota, state, readcount) values (#{id}, #{booktitle}, #{bookcover}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{challengestart}, #{challengeend}, #{challengeperiod}, #{quota}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, b.isbn13, b.author, b.pubDate, b.categoryName, b.description, b.score, b.page, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.status = '승인' THEN 1 END) AS approved FROM studyboard s JOIN book b ON s.booktitle = b.title LEFT JOIN studyapplication a ON s.no = a.studyboardno WHERE s.no = #{no} GROUP BY s.no, b.isbn13, b.author, b.pubDate, b.categoryName, b.description, b.score, b.page;
mapper.insert: insert into studyevent (studyBoardNo, title, start, end, className) values (#{studyBoardNo}, #{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{className})
insert into studyboardcomm (id, studyboardno, content, ref, lev, seq, created) values (#{id}, #{studyboardno}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0, now())
insert into studyapplication (studyboardno, application_id, application_content, request_date, response_date) values (#{studyboardno}, #{applicationid}, #{applicationcontent}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select * from studyapplication where studyboardno = #{studyboardno} and status = '승인'
mapper.insert: insert into studymanagement (studyboardno, studystart, studyend, studyperiod, leader_id, booktitle, studystatus) values (#{studyboardno}, #{studystart}, #{studyend}, #{studyperiod}, #{leader_id}, #{booktitle}, #{studystatus})
